ETYMOLOGY: From Old English lagu (from Old Norse lag 'something laid down or fixed'), of Germanic origin, related to 'lay'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), often used with 'the' to refer to the system.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The system of rules which a particular country or community recognizes as regulating the actions of its members and which it may enforce by the imposition of penalties.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 某国家或社区认可并强制执行的，规范其成员行为的规则体系。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Respect for the law is essential for a stable society.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 尊重法律对于稳定的社会至关重要。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), here referring to a countable, specific rule.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An individual rule, typically one of a set of rules, prescribed by authority for the ordering of a society.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 由权威机构为社会秩序而制定的一项具体规则。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Parliament passed a new law to protect endangered species.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 议会通过了一项新法律来保护濒危物种。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), here referring to a field of study or a profession.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The study of the system of rules of a particular country or community, or the profession of practicing these rules.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 对某个国家或社区规则体系的研究，或从事这些规则的职业。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She decided to study law after graduating from high school.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 高中毕业后她决定学习法律。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), here referring to a scientific or natural principle.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A statement of fact, deduced from observation, to the effect that a particular natural or scientific phenomenon always occurs if certain conditions are present.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 根据观察得出的事实陈述，表明在特定条件下，某种自然或科学现象总是发生。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Newton's laws of motion are fundamental to classical mechanics.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 牛顿运动定律是经典力学的基本原理。

MEANINGS.PATTERN: a law | the laws of [sth] (general principle)
MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), here referring to a general principle or rule of conduct.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A general principle to which all members of a group or all situations of a certain type are subject.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 适用于某群体所有成员或某一类所有情况的普遍原则。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It's the first law of business: the customer is always right.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这是商业的第一法则：顾客永远是对的。
